name: UsingMarineVHFRadio
0:
”Alexa, open Marine VHF”
”Give me an overview of marine VHF”
”Tell me how to hail another boat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: marine v. h. f.
des: Learn how to use a marine VHF radio! Learn proper protocols for hailing other vessels and making distress calls. Learn about Mayday, Pan Pan and Securite calls. Interactively practice calling other boats with this fun and engaging skill! Ask Alexa to Open Marine VHF.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
